description:
Telescope: Explorer scientific Ed 127 CF FCD-100
Camera: ASI183pro
Filters: Astrodon E series LRGB
Mount: Atlas EQ-G
Guiding camera: 290 mini with Evo50
 
 
L RGB: Lum in 3 sets 2:3:5min   26:85:18    then  rgb 44:27:38 3min
 
Total integration time: 12.05
Seeing/ environment:2
Bortle Class: Class 5/6 Backyard~ Central Indiana
 
 
Dates of acquisition: 10/2,4,5,8,9/2019, and 12/22/19 for 1.5 hour of Lum
 
 
processing: considerations.  MULTIPLE nights with good alignment (2 degree error allowed in SGP) flat and dark calibration on 12/22/19 off but salvaged
 
6 master files 
Crop
DBE
RGB combine
RGB workflow~PCC; MLT with 2 iterations 5/.85, 3.5/.75, 3/.5, 2/.25 (pretty heavy NR done); HT; 10% bg and SCNR
Synth Lum with all 6 combine
Lum workflow~decon with autopsf 75 iterations 5 layers; MLT fairly heavy like the RGB but a slightly stronger protection mask over the brighter structures.
 
LRGB combine: Bg at 10%; 
TGDVN
Curves with game script masking for slight sat boost 
XPTR with game script mask for lum boost; MLT for sharpening.
Morph to reduce the stars just a bit and ICC to end.  very lightly finished in Light room for selective brightening

Hope you enjoy
imaging_telescopes: Expore Scientific 127mm APO refractor Explore Scientific Refractor 127mm FCD-100 ED
title: NGC 1333  reflection Nebula
